t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 17 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: History of Amazon - Wikipedia

t: How Amazon’s big private-label business is growing and leaving small brands to protect against knockoffs
s: October 12, 2022 - Amazon continues to invest in private labels such as AmazonBasics, despite accusations that the company copies some of its top-selling third-party products.

t: Amazon.jobs: Help us build Earth’s most customer-centric company.
